title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: A small Jesuit school in Denver has quietly become a pipeline for powerful Republicans surrounding Trump
items.description: Erika Kirk and Lindsey Halligan, two conservative figures who have made headlines recently, both attended Regis University.

items.description: Murati enjoyed roles at Goldman Sachs and Tesla before making her name in artificial intelligence.

items.title: Federal judge to sentence Justice Brett Kavanaugh's attempted assassin
items.description: A defendant faces sentencing Friday for attempting to assassinate Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh, with prosecutors seeking 30 years in prison.

items.title: India, China to start direct flights this month as ties warm
